title: Tony Quiroga (Car and Driver)
description: Once again we're joined by Tony Quiroga of Car And Driver. This week we cover the Fiata, fuel economy tests betwen a Hellcat, Ferrari F12 and a Sequoia, how best to avoid tickets if you happen to be a journalist, obscure japanese micro cars and the mythical Porsche F1 engines.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
